dc:title: Reflections During Advent
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: During the Advent of 1966 Dorothy Day wrote a four-part series for Ave Maria magazine grouped under the title "Reflections During Advent."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 558 1966-11-26 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
